page.title: 05 - EMPLOYMENT (2)
page.content:
There is a home for mentally retarded adults, called CARE, (Cottage And Rural Enterprises), at Burton Rough, which employs many people,some of whom live-in as part of the job. Its aim is to enable mentally handicapped adults to live as normal a life as possible.
In the workshops they make wooden objects, including furniture, and handicrafts such as soft toys. The goods are sold to the general public along with plants and vegetables which are grown in the garden. CARE provides both homes and work for its residents.
Many local residents are involved in bed-and-breakfast, mainly for the summer tourist trade, as there are no hotels in the area.
